title: Book Review: “Seen and Unseen,” by Elizabeth Partridge and Lauren Tamaki; “My Nest of Silence,” by Matt Faulkner
description: Two books for young readers shine a light on the experiences of Japanese Americans during World War II.
dc:creator: Abby McGanney Nolan
media:description: From “Seen and Unseen”: photograph by Ansel Adams (“Richard Kabayashi, Farmer with Cabbages”), 1943, Library of Congress; illustration by Lauren Tamaki.
